'''1.5.1 Build 14''' is the fourteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.1, released in 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].

== Additions ==

* Ability to change LWJGL version from launcher settings
** (using LWJGL version 2.9 should fix "Could not get JAWT
** interface" problem with mac & java 1.7).

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Installer backup freezing (hopefully).
